class.name: FontData
class.brief_description: Font source data and prerendered glyph cache, imported from dynamic or bitmap font. Supported font formats: - Dynamic font importer: TrueType (.ttf), OpenType (.otf), WOFF (.woff), Type 1 (.pfb, .pfm). - Bitmap font importer: AngelCode BMFont (.fnt, .font), text and binary (version 3) format variants. - Monospace image font importer: All supported image formats.

method.name: clear_cache
method.description: Removes all font cache entries.

method.name: clear_glyphs
method.description: Removes all rendered glyphs information from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove textures associated with the glyphs, use [method remove_texture] to remove them manually.

method.name: clear_kerning_map
method.description: Removes all kerning overrides.

method.name: clear_size_cache
method.description: Removes all font sizes from the cache entry

method.name: clear_textures
method.description: Removes all textures from font cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove glyphs associated with the texture, use [method remove_glyph] to remove them manually.

method.name: find_cache
method.description: Returns existing or creates a new font cache entry for the specified variation coordinates.

method.name: get_ascent
method.description: Returns the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: get_cache_count
method.description: Returns number of the font cache entries.

method.name: get_cache_rid
method.description: Returns text server font cache entry resource id.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Returns contents of the dynamic font source file.

method.name: get_descent
method.description: Returns font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: get_fixed_size
method.description: Returns font fixed size.

method.name: get_font_name
method.description: Returns font family name.

method.name: get_font_style
method.description: Returns font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: get_font_style_name
method.description: Returns font style name.

method.name: get_glyph_advance
method.description: Returns glyph advance (offset of the next glyph). [b]Note:[/b] Advance for glyphs outlines is the same as the base glyph advance and is not saved.

method.name: get_glyph_index
method.description: Returns the glyph index of a [code]char[/code], optionally modified by the [code]variation_selector[/code].

method.name: get_glyph_list
method.description: Returns list of rendered glyphs in the cache entry.

method.name: get_glyph_offset
method.description: Returns glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: get_glyph_size
method.description: Returns glyph size.

method.name: get_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Returns index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: get_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Returns rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: get_hinting
method.description: Returns the font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: get_kerning
method.description: Returns kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: get_kerning_list
method.description: Returns list of the kerning overrides.

method.name: get_language_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]language[/code].

method.name: get_language_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of language support overrides.

method.name: get_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: Returns the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: get_msdf_size
method.description: Returns source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: get_oversampling
method.description: Returns font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: get_scale
method.description: Returns scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: get_script_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]script[/code].

method.name: get_script_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of script support overrides.

method.name: get_size_cache_list
method.description: Return list of the font sizes in the cache. Each size is [code]Vector2i[/code] with font size and outline size.

method.name: get_spacing
method.description: Returns extra spacing added between glyphs in pixels.

method.name: get_supported_chars
method.description: Returns a string containing all the characters available in the font.

method.name: get_supported_feature_list
method.description: Returns list of OpenType features supported by font.

method.name: get_supported_variation_list
method.description: Returns list of supported [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/dvaraxisreg]variation coordinates[/url], each coordinate is returned as [code]tag: Vector3i(min_value,max_value,default_value)[/code]. Font variations allow for continuous change of glyph characteristics along some given design axis, such as weight, width or slant.

method.name: get_texture_count
method.description: Returns number of textures used by font cache entry.

method.name: get_texture_image
method.description: Returns a copy of the font cache texture image.

method.name: get_texture_offsets
method.description: Returns a copy of the array containing the first free pixel in the each column of texture. Should be the same size as texture width or empty.

method.name: get_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: get_variation_coordinates
method.description: Returns variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method get_supported_variation_list] for more info.

method.name: has_char
method.description: Return [code]true[/code] if a Unicode [code]char[/code] is available in the font.

method.name: is_antialiased
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font 8-bit anitialiased glyph rendering is supported and enabled.

method.name: is_force_autohinter
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if auto-hinting is supported and preferred over font built-in hinting. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: is_language_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given language ([url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1]ISO 639[/url] code).

method.name: is_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data.

method.name: is_script_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given script ([url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_15924]ISO 15924[/url] code).

method.name: remove_cache
method.description: Removes specified font cache entry.

method.name: remove_glyph
method.description: Removes specified rendered glyph information from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove textures associated with the glyphs, use [method remove_texture] to remove them manually.

method.name: remove_kerning
method.description: Removes kerning override for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: remove_language_support_override
method.description: Remove language support override.

method.name: remove_script_support_override
method.description: Removes script support override.

method.name: remove_size_cache
method.description: Removes specified font size from the cache entry.

method.name: remove_texture
method.description: Removes specified texture from font cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove glyphs associated with the texture, remove them manually, using [method remove_glyph].

method.name: render_glyph
method.description: Renders specified glyph the the font cache texture.

method.name: render_range
method.description: Renders the range of characters to the font cache texture.

method.name: set_antialiased
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], 8-bit antialiased glyph rendering is used, otherwise 1-bit rendering is used. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: set_ascent
method.description: Sets the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: set_data
method.description: Sets font source data, e.g contents of the dynamic font source file.

method.name: set_descent
method.description: Sets the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: set_fixed_size
method.description: Sets the fixed size for the font.

method.name: set_font_name
method.description: Sets the font family name.

method.name: set_font_style
method.description: Sets the font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: set_font_style_name
method.description: Sets the font style name.

method.name: set_force_autohinter
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] auto-hinting is preferred over font built-in hinting.

method.name: set_glyph_advance
method.description: Sets glyph advance (offset of the next glyph). [b]Note:[/b] Advance for glyphs outlines is the same as the base glyph advance and is not saved.

method.name: set_glyph_offset
method.description: Sets glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: set_glyph_size
method.description: Sets glyph size.

method.name: set_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Sets index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: set_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Sets rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: set_hinting
method.description: Sets font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: set_kerning
method.description: Sets kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: set_language_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method is_language_supported].

method.name: set_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: Sets the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: set_msdf_size
method.description: Sets source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: set_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field (MSDF) generated from the dynamic font vector data. MSDF rendering allows displaying the font at any scaling factor without blurriness, and without incurring a CPU cost when the font size changes (since the font no longer needs to be rasterized on the CPU). As a downside, font hinting is not available with MSDF. The lack of font hinting may result in less crisp and less readable fonts at small sizes. [b]Note:[/b] MSDF font rendering does not render glyphs with overlapping shapes correctly. Overlapping shapes are not valid per the OpenType standard, but are still commonly found in many font files, especially those converted by Google Fonts. To avoid issues with overlapping glyphs, consider downloading the font file directly from the type foundry instead of relying on Google Fonts.

method.name: set_oversampling
method.description: Sets font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: set_scale
method.description: Sets scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: set_script_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method is_script_supported].

method.name: set_spacing
method.description: Sets extra spacing added between glyphs in pixels.

method.name: set_texture_image
method.description: Sets font cache texture image.

method.name: set_texture_offsets
method.description: Sets array containing the first free pixel in the each column of texture. Should be the same size as texture width or empty (for the fonts without dynamic glyph generation support).

method.name: set_underline_position
method.description: Sets pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: set_underline_thickness
method.description: Sets thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: set_variation_coordinates
method.description: Sets variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method get_supported_variation_list] for more info.
